contents: Article 5 (Duties) ① The chairperson represents the Fair Election Commission and supervises its affairs. ② The vice chairperson assists the chairperson, and if the chairperson is unable to perform his/her duties due to unavoidable reasons, the vice chairpersons shall perform the duties in order of seniority. ③ Members form the Fair Election Committee and attend the Fair Election Committee to discuss matters related to their duties.
